title: Lower Warbank Roman Villa
description: A Romano-British villa near Keston, built over an earlier Iron Age site. Findspot of RIB 3025.

properties.description: Coordinates derived from Pastscape record and converted to WGS84 latitude, longitude values from the Ordnance Survey grid reference (TQ 4131 6327), resolved to its center point.
properties.title: Representative point derived from Pastscape
